column1: jim||Am I correct in saying Python is better than Java?
mary|jim|@jim Yeah, spot on! Python is way superior to Java.
john||Can I do rest apis in NodeJs? Also does Loopback works as a framework?

mary||Have you guys seen the latest golang framework?
it_support||Loopback is one of the best Nodejs frameworks.
